abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the maker of Budweiser and Stella Artois, is said to be near a $12 billion deal for Grupo Modelo.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the maker of Budweiser and Stella Artois, is said to be near a $12 billion deal for Grupo Modelo.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev is nearing a deal to buy the half of Grupo Modelo it does not already own, according to people briefed on the matter, giving the global brewing giant control over the maker of Corona Extra beer.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch InBev Is Said to Be Near a Deal for Grupo Modelo
headline.print_headline: No. 1 Brewer Nears Deal For Modelo

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
